message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split. This ensures a fair distribution considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This acknowledges your initial offer while reflecting the increasing value of the money to me in later rounds.
Considering the diminishing value of money, I propose an equal split of $50 each. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the impact of inflation on our offers.
